nodes.text: Omi Vass was a female Tholothian. At one point, after the Battle of Yavin, she, Killaen Chamat and Codo Keburr searched a temple on Malian for a Sith holocron. Vass used the Force to subdue the guardian droid, and then once inside the temple, drew her red-bladed lightsaber.
Omi Vass appears in the opening story of Fantasy Flight Games' 2018 roleplaying game sourcebook Unlimited Power.
